vulnerability.name: USN-4381-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4381-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in Django. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Dan Palmer discovered that Django incorrectly validated memcached cache  keys. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of  service and obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2020-13254)   Jon Dufresne discovered that Django incorrectly encoded query parameters  for the admin ForeignKeyRawIdWidget. A remote attacker could possibly use  this issue to perform XSS attacks. (CVE-2020-13596)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in Django. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
